//: All done!  The project is now available in the dist/ folder.
Open your web browser of choice and visit http://localhost.
#1 installs npm dependencies for this project.
#2 grabs the maps from dropbox (only ever do this once).
#3 builds the project to the dist folder.
#4 runs a local web server in background.
#5 watches for changes to any files in the assets folder and if a change is detected,
the build task is executed immediately so the results are visible your browser.
name: witcher3map
description: Unofficial Witcher 3 interactive maps, with a mobile & tablet friendly design faithful to the game.

scripts.clean: rimraf dist/favicon.ico dist/index.html dist/files/fonts dist/files/images dist/files/locales dist/files/scripts dist/files/styles dist/s dist/v dist/w
scripts.concat-vendor-scripts: jscat node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/i18next/node_modules/i18next-client/i18next.min.js node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.js assets/scripts/vendor/FileSaver.min.js assets/scripts/vendor/jquery.ddslick.min.js assets/scripts/vendor/jquery.nicescroll.min.js assets/scripts/vendor/leaflet-hash-params.js assets/scripts/vendor/leaflet-search.js assets/scripts/vendor/leaflet.plugins.js > dist/files/scripts/vendor.bundle.js
scripts.minify-styles: cleancss --skip-rebase assets/styles/home.css --output dist/files/styles/home.min.css && cleancss --skip-rebase assets/styles/main.css --output dist/files/styles/main.min.css
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean -s && mkdirp dist/files/fonts dist/files/images dist/files/locales dist/files/scripts dist/files/styles --mode 0444
scripts.build: npm run build:fonts && npm run build:images && npm run build:locales && npm run build:markup && npm run build:scripts && npm run build:styles
scripts.build:fonts: ncp node_modules/font-awesome/fonts dist/files/fonts && ncp assets/fonts dist/files/fonts
scripts.build:images: imagemin assets/images dist/files/images && ncp node_modules/leaflet/dist/images dist/files/images/leaflet
scripts.build:scripts: ncp assets/scripts/custom dist/files/scripts && npm run concat-vendor-scripts
scripts.build:styles: ncp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css dist/files/styles/leaflet.css && ncp node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css dist/files/styles/font-awesome.min.css && npm run minify-styles
scripts.build:watch: parallelshell "npm run watch:fonts" "npm run watch:images" "npm run watch:locales" "npm run watch:markup" "npm run watch:scripts" "npm run watch:styles"
